commit.message:
re PR libgcj/34369 (java.net.URI.relativize(URI) method returns incorrect results)

2008-01-21  Luciano Chavez  <lnx1138@us.ibm.com>

	PR libgcj/34369:
	* java/net/URI.java (relativize): Check initial segment for
	trailing "/".

From-SVN: r131701

files.patch:

+
+	PR libgcj/34369:
+	* java/net/URI.java (relativize): Check initial segment for
+	trailing "/".
